attributes.action: Fireworks is unnecessary and bad for our environment. Stop using fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Because bad for the environment and also the animals get sick and panicked by the noise.stop polluting the air.
attributes.background: No fireworks to be used by the people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Limit the sale and use of Fireworks to licence holders only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013

Reduce the maximum decibel limit on fireworks from 120 to 90
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700049

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
